p: The goldenrod extract combined with ciprofloxacin and the extract combined with amikacin showed a short-term PASME which lasted only 30 min. E. coli bacteria treated with the extract itself increased their growth by one logarithmic value after 45 min. Ciprofloxacin and amikacin showed the longest duration of PASME, lasting 1 h 45 min and 2 h 15 min, respectively.
